CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.1)
PROJECT(YRTIMU CXX)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

SET(YRTIMU_VERSION_MAJOR 7)
SET(YRTIMU_VERSION_MINOR 2)
SET(YRTIMU_VERSION_PATCH 1)
SET(YRTIMU_VERSION ${YRTIMU_VERSION_MAJOR}.${YRTIMU_VERSION_MINOR}.${YRTIMU_VERSION_PATCH})

SET(YRTIMU_SRCS
    yRtimu.cpp
)

IF(UNIX)
    ADD_LIBRARY(YRTIMU SHARED ${YRTIMU_SRCS})
    SET_PROPERTY(TARGET YRTIMU PROPERTY VERSION ${YRTIMU_VERSION})
    SET_PROPERTY(TARGET YRTIMU PROPERTY SOVERSION ${YRTIMU_VERSION_MAJOR})
    INSTALL(TARGET YRTIMU DESTINATION lib)
    INSTALL(DIRECTORY . DESTINATION include FILES_MATCHING PATTERN "*.h")
ENDIF(UNIX)
